# `/list` Command
Lists players on the server.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Any</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>No</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### List players
`/list`

List players on the server.
